title: Clackamas Town Center
description: A large shopping mall in Clackamas, Oregon, offering a wide variety of stores and restaurants.

title: Washington Square
description: One of the largest shopping centers in Oregon, located in Tigard. It features a mix of high-end retailers, dining options, and entertainment.

title: Woodburn Premium Outlets
description: An outlet shopping destination in Woodburn, Oregon, known for its discounted prices on a wide range of brands.

title: Pioneer Place
description: A public square in downtown Portland, known for its historical significance and outdoor events.
